page_modList_noResults_1: No matching mods found in profile
page_modList_noResults_2: Try to adjust your search query/filters
page_dependantsDialog_uninstall_descript: The following mods depend on %s and will likely not work if it is uninstalled:
page_dependantsDialog_disable_descriptio: The following mods depend on %s and will likely not work if it is disabled:
page_dependantsDialog_enable_description: %s depends on the following disabled mods, and will likely not work if any of them are disabled:
menuBar_importLocalMod_title: Select the mod file to import
menuBar_exportFile_title: Select the folder to export the profile to
menuBar_uninstallDisabledMods_confirm: Are you sure you want to uninstall all disabled mods?
menuBar_clearModCache_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all cached mods? This could potentially double the disk space used by installed mods. Only proceed if you know what you're doing!
menuBar_dialog_content_rename: Enter a new name for the profile:
menuBar_dialog_content_duplicate: Enter a name for the duplicated profile:
toolBar_launchGame_message: Please wait for mod installations to complete before launching.
toolBar_dialog_launch_content: This might take a few minutes depending on the size of your profile.
prefs_locations_dataFolder_content: The folder where mods and profiles are stored. Changing this will move the existing data.
prefs_appearance_color_primary_content: The main color of the interface, including backgrounds and text.
prefs_appearance_color_accent_content: The color of highlighted elements, such as buttons and checkboxes
prefs_miscellaneous_fetchMods_content_1: Whether to automatically fetch mods every 15 minutes. This will ensure the mod list stays relatively up-to-date, but can be disabled to save bandwidth.
prefs_miscellaneous_fetchMods_content_2: To manually trigger a fetch, go to
prefs_miscellaneous_sendTelemetry_conten: Whether to send anonymous usage metrics when the app starts.
prefs_miscellaneous_pullBeforeLaunch_con: Whether to pull updates from synced profiles before launching.
prefs_gameSettings_locations_dirOverride: Overrides the location of the {game} folder. If unset, Gale will try to find it via the specified platform instead.
apiKeyPref_content: Thunderstore API token to use for modpack publishing. Once this is set, you will not be able to view the token again.
apiKeyDialog_content_1: Enter your Thunderstore API token below, or leave blank to clear the current one.
apiKeyDialog_content_2: This token is used to publish modpacks to Thunderstore, and will be stored securely on your computer.
apiKeyDialog_content_5: be able to view the token again.
apiKeyDialog_link: Unsure how to get your API token?
platformPref_content: The platform where your game is installed.
launchModePref_content_1: Determines how the game is launched.
launchModePref_content_3: Launches via the specified platform. This is required for some games that, for example, require Steam to be running.
launchModePref_content_5: Launches the game directly from the executable. Allows you to launch multiple instances at once.
launchModePref_instance_content_1: How many instances of the game to launch at once. Only available in
launchModePref_interval_content_1: How many seconds to wait between launching each instance. Only applicable in
customArgsPref_content_1: Allows you to add custom arguments to the launch command. Depending on
customArgsPref_content_3: , these are either ran against the game or launcher executable.
customArgsPref_content_4: Only pass one argument per entry, so instead of
importR2Flow_content: The data folder of your r2modman/TMM installation.
importR2Flow_content_noFound: No installations found, please specify the path above.
welcomeDialog_content_gameSelect: To get started, select a game to mod:
welcomeDialog_content_importProfiles_1: You can automatically transfer profiles from another mod manager to Gale.
welcomeDialog_content_importProfiles_2: You can always import profiles later by going to
welcomeDialog_content_settings_1: Let's make sure your settings are to your liking.
welcomeDialog_content_settings_2: You can always edit these later by going to
welcomeDialog_content_color_primary: The main color of the interface, including backgrounds and text.
welcomeDialog_content_color_accent: The color of highlighted elements, such as buttons and checkboxes
welcomeDialog_content_end_1: That's it, you're all set up to start modding!
welcomeDialog_content_end_2: If you have any questions or need help, feel free to ask in the
welcomeDialog_settings_path_content: The folder where mods and profiles are stored. Make sure you have plenty of space on its device.
gameSelect_content_2: Your game missing? If the game is new on Thunderstore there's a chance we have yet to add it. If you can find it on
gameSelect_content_3: but not here, please message us on
installModDialog_content: Choose a profile to install the mod to:
createProfileDialog_content: Choose a name for the new profile
updater_update_message: Gale will now restart in order to apply the update.
updater_confirmDialog_content_next: Version {next} of Gale is available - you have {current}.
updater_confirmDialog_content_available: There is an update available for Gale.
updater_confirmDialog_content: The update will be downloaded in the background, then the app will restart to apply it.
browse_modList_content_2: Try to adjust your search query/filters
syncer_disconnect_ask: Do you also want to delete the profile from the database?
syncer_copyLink_message: Copied profile import link to clipboard.
syncer_content_2: This profile has been deleted and can no longer receive updates or be imported.
ownedSyncProfilesDialog_deleteProfile_co: Are you sure you want to delete {name} from the database? This will disconnect all subscribers and prevent you from pushing further updates!
syncDonationNotice_content_1: Profile sync is run on donations!
syncDonationNotice_content_2: If you like this feature, please consider supporting on
aboutDialog_latestVersion: You are running the latest version
exportCodeDialog_content_2: Export complete! The code has been copied to your clipboard:
importR2Dialog_content_3: from r2modman or Thunderstore Mod Manager.
importR2Dialog_content_4: Do not close Gale while the import is in progress.
importProfileDialog_importData_confirm: Are you sure you want to override {name}?
importProfileDialog_tabsMenu_new_content: A unique name for the imported profile.
importProfileDialog_tabsMenu_overwrite_c: Which existing profile to overwrite with the imported one.
importProfileDialog_details_advancedOpti: Import all files found in the profile, instead of just well-known config file formats. This is unsafe and can let an attacker install malware on your system.
Only enable this for trusted profiles!
importProfileDialog_sync_tooltip_content: This profile will receive automatic updates from its owner.
